info.title: Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) Content Builder
info.description: Builds a MIME server report and it can be used to download a server file.

prop.name: fileType
prop.description: The type of the file. See HTTPResponse.

method.name: set
method.description: Prepares the file to be downloaded.

parameter.name: $fileName
parameter.description: The full path of the file to be downloaded.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The type of the file. See HTTPResponse constants for a list of file types.

method.name: setFileContents
method.description: Prepares the file contents to be downloaded.

parameter.name: $type
parameter.description: The type of the contents given. See HTTPResponse constants for a list of file types.

method.name: getReport
method.description: Creates a stream report for downloading the file.

parameter.name: $suggestedFileName
parameter.description: The suggested file name for downloading the server file. Leave empty and it will be the file original name. It is empty by default.

parameter.name: $ignore_user_abort
parameter.description: Indicator for aborting the running script upon user cancelation.

parameter.name: $removeFile
parameter.description: Set to true to delete the file after downloading. If is false by default.

method.returndescription: The file stream report to be sent to the output buffer.
